sentences.en: Adequately replenish the equipment and supplies of the armed forces.
sentences.cn: 对军队的装备和给养给以合理的补充.

sentences.en: He had come to replenish his pack and Simon was his employer.
sentences.cn: 他是来趸货的,赛蒙是他的雇主.

sentences.en: I always replenish my food supply before it is depleted.
sentences.cn: 我总是在我的食物吃完之前加以补充.

sentences.en: I have been doing breathing exercises to replenish my energy.
sentences.cn: 这几天在家养气呢,补充精力.

sentences.en: In so doing, we can replenish our reservoir of faith.
sentences.cn: 我们在这样做的过程中, 就会信心倍增.

sentences.en: It increase skin elasticity, increases cell regeneration, replenish skin nutrients and moisture.
sentences.cn: 增加皮肤弹性 、 增加细胞再生力 、 补充营养及水份.

sentences.en: It's time to replenish the shop with the news year's goods.
sentences.cn: 该为家商店补充新年货物了.

sentences.en: Let me replenish your glass with some more wine.
sentences.cn: 让我给你杯子里再添点葡萄酒.

sentences.en: Let me replenish your glass, eg with more wine.
sentences.cn: 我给你把杯子再斟满吧.

sentences.en: Maintain and replenish test area supplies on a daily basis.
sentences.cn: 在工作中维护测试区域.

sentences.en: More vaccines are needed to replenish our stocks.
sentences.cn: 还需要更多的疫苗来补充我们的储备。

sentences.en: There is a concern about replenish-ment of the population.
sentences.cn: 有人担心人口的补充问题。

sentences.en: Three hundred thousand tons of cereals are needed to replenish stocks.
sentences.cn: 需要30万吨谷类补充库存。

sentences.en: to replenish food and water supplies
We have to import an extra 4 million tons of wheat to replenish our reserves.
sentences.cn: 我们不得不额外进口四百万吨小麦以补充我们的储备.
你最好给炉火再添些燃料.

trans.tran_cn: 补充，再装满；把…装满；给…添加燃料
trans.tran_en: to put new supplies into something, or to fill something again

trans.tran_cn: 补充，重新装满，把…装满，〈古〉使牲口[人和动物]众多
trans.tran_en: to put new supplies into something, or to fill something again
